document_data.mainbody:
Sparks Musgravel was a member of The Guild from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Sparks was a middle-aged human man of light complexion. He had green eyes and wavy blonde hair. Like other grunts of the Guild, Sparks wore green-colored wizardly garb and carried a simple staff.
In the , Sparks Musgravel was tasked with standing guard of the secret entrance into Baldurs Gates Undercellar where The Guilds Guildhall was hidden. Whilst a half-orcish enforcer Tusgront manned the main entrance, Sparks was ready to dispatch of any unwanted guest from a distance.
